devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: Do not transfer NATIVE or tokens directly to this address. Only send NATIVE here when using a method, and only approve tokens for transfer to here when using a method. Direct NATIVE transfers will be rejected and direct token transfers will be lost.

redeemCustomCollateral(address,uint256,a.details: Redeem "special" collateral tokens (before swapping the output for borrowed tokens to be repaid via Uniswap). Public visibility because we have to call this function externally if called from a payable FuseSafeLiquidator function (for some reason delegatecall fails when called with msg.value > 0).

params.cErc20Collateral: The cErc20 collateral contract to be liquidated.
params.cEther: The borrowed cEther contract to repay.
params.exchangeSeizedTo: If set to an address other than `cTokenCollateral`, exchange seized collateral to this ERC20 token contract address (or the zero address for NATIVE).
params.minOutputAmount: The minimum amount of collateral to seize (or the minimum exchange output if applicable) required for execution. Reverts if this condition is not met.
params.redemptionStrategies: The IRedemptionStrategy contracts to use, if any, to redeem "special" collateral tokens (before swapping the output for borrowed tokens to be repaid via Uniswap).
params.strategyData: The data for the chosen IRedemptionStrategy contracts, if any.
params.uniswapV2Router: The UniswapV2Router to use to convert the seized underlying collateral.

params.cTokenCollateral: The cToken collateral to be liquidated.
params.exchangeSeizedTo: If set to an address other than `cTokenCollateral`, exchange seized collateral to this ERC20 token contract address (or the zero address for NATIVE).
params.minOutputAmount: The minimum amount of collateral to seize (or the minimum exchange output if applicable) required for execution. Reverts if this condition is not met.
params.redemptionStrategies: The IRedemptionStrategy contracts to use, if any, to redeem "special" collateral tokens (before swapping the output for borrowed tokens to be repaid via Uniswap).
params.repayAmount: The amount to repay to liquidate the unhealthy loan.
params.strategyData: The data for the chosen IRedemptionStrategy contracts, if any.
params.uniswapV2Router: The UniswapV2Router to use to convert the seized underlying collateral.

params.cErc20: The borrowed CErc20 contract to repay.
params.cTokenCollateral: The cToken collateral contract to be liquidated.
params.exchangeProfitTo: If set to an address other than `cTokenCollateral`, exchange seized collateral to this ERC20 token contract address (or the zero address for NATIVE).
params.minProfitAmount: The minimum amount of profit required for execution (in terms of `exchangeProfitTo`). Reverts if this condition is not met.
params.redemptionStrategies: The IRedemptionStrategy contracts to use, if any, to redeem "special" collateral tokens (before swapping the output for borrowed tokens to be repaid via Uniswap).
params.repayAmount: The amount to repay to liquidate the unhealthy loan.
params.strategyData: The data for the chosen IRedemptionStrategy contracts, if any.
params.uniswapV2RouterForBorrow: The UniswapV2Router to use to convert the NATIVE to the underlying borrow (and flashloan the underlying borrow for NATIVE).
params.uniswapV2RouterForCollateral: The UniswapV2Router to use to convert the underlying collateral to NATIVE.

BTC_TOKEN.details: Wrapped BTC token to use for flash loans

PAIR_INIT_HASH_CODE.details: Wrapped BTC token to use for flash loans

STABLE_TOKEN.details: Stable token to use for flash loans

_liquidatorProfitExchangeSource.details: Cached liquidator profit exchange source. ERC20 token address or the zero address for NATIVE. For use in `safeLiquidateToTokensWithFlashLoan`/`safeLiquidateToEthWithFlashLoan` after it is set by `postFlashLoanTokens`/`postFlashLoanWeth`.

devdoc.title: FuseSafeLiquidator

safeLiquidate(address,address,address,ui.notice: Safely liquidate an unhealthy loan (using capital from the sender), confirming that at least `minOutputAmount` in collateral is seized (or outputted by exchange if applicable).

safeLiquidate(address,uint256,address,ad.notice: Safely liquidate an unhealthy loan (using capital from the sender), confirming that at least `minOutputAmount` in collateral is seized (or outputted by exchange if applicable).

safeLiquidateToTokensWithFlashLoan(addre.notice: Safely liquidate an unhealthy loan, confirming that at least `minProfitAmount` in NATIVE profit is seized.

userdoc.notice: FuseSafeLiquidator safely liquidates unhealthy borrowers (with flashloan support).
